Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of tail of possible lion to right; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the tail, see Lemos no. 952 from Thessaloniki.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0944) (phase 2)
